mapper.insert: insert into sys_porint (table_id, version, boot_num, sys_chip, person_chip, chip_gap, chip_add, sys_cash, person_cash,cash_gap,cash_add, sys_insurance, person_insurance,insurance_gap,insurance_add, water,chip_win,insurance_win,create_by,create_time,remark) values (#{tableId}, #{version}, #{bootNum}, #{sysChip}, #{personChip}, #{chipGap}, #{chipAdd}, #{sysCash},#{personCash},#{cashGap}, #{cashAdd}, #{sysInsurance},#{personInsurance},#{insuranceGap}, #{insuranceAdd}, #{water}, #{chipWin}, #{insuranceWin},#{createBy},sysdate(),#{remark})
mapper.update: update sys_porint set sys_chip = sys_chip + #{chip}, chip_gap = chip_gap + #{chip}, sys_cash = sys_chip + #{cash}, cash_gap = chip_gap + #{cash}, sys_insurance = sys_insurance + #{insurance}, insurance_gap = insurance_gap + #{insurance}, chip_win = chip_win - #{cash} - #{chip}, insurance_win = insurance_win - #{insurance}, water = water + #{water}, update_time = sysdate() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, table_id tableId, boot_num bootNum, sys_chip sysChip, person_chip personChip, chip_gap chipGap, chip_add chipAdd, sys_insurance sysInsurance, person_insurance personInsurance, insurance_gap insuranceGap, insurance_add insuranceAdd, water water, chip_win chipWin, insurance_win insuranceWin, create_time createTime, create_by createBy, remark FROM sys_porint where id = #{id}
